parameters.name: appFabricDataSourceS3URI
parameters.description: (Optional) The S3 uri of the AppFabric data source. For example, enter s3://MyBucket/. The solution will output sample logs to this location.

parameters.name: kinesisFirehoseARN
parameters.description: (Optional) If specified the solution will also inject records into the given Kinesis Firehose ARN

tags.project: AppFabric Sample Log Generator starter project
